%7C0%7C638645767538019806%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=FsnPNpTRIenmWryUDVOt5vW3h2T%2FYKcj7pjMztfAB8I%3D&reserved=0> 	

Hi Hagop,



We are very excited to officially invite you to Ivalua NOW 2025 - Innovate to Elevate.



This time, we are going back to the heart of Paris, to the Carrousel du Louvre, for insightful keynotes, inspiring customer stories, advanced technology innovations, and fantastic networking opportunities.

 <https://info.ivalua.com/hs-fs/hubfs/icon-gens-b-1-C.png?width=200&upscale=true&name=icon-gens-b-1-C.png> 	

800+ attendees

 <https://info.ivalua.com/hs-fs/hubfs/icon-gensseul-b-1-C.png?width=200&upscale=true&name=icon-gensseul-b-1-C.png> 	

100% Dedicated to Procurement & Supply Chains Professionals

 <https://info.ivalua.com/hs-fs/hubfs/icon-partner.png?width=200&upscale=true&name=icon-partner.png> 	

25+ Partners Sponsors

 <https://info.ivalua.com/hs-fs/hubfs/icon-speaker-b-1-C.png?width=200&upscale=true&name=icon-speaker-b-1-C.png> 	

25+ Speakers


And to end this day in style, we’ll hold our traditional Closing Party at the famous Opéra Garnier.


REGISTER NOW <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Finfo.ivalua.com%2Fe3t%2FCtc%2FWW%2B113%2Fc2Pz504%2FVVwM9H8K2WxrW6sr1p43yWZ9mW1f4B6k5m9nwFM3ZwQMcjszCW6N38Bs6lZ3n-VHQxkg2J2Wr-W6476Pk29pvq8Vr-KPl9fj5F7W1YGxNN7hqkZvW4lgQcL5MmCKrN8gxXFkKgksnVNs-g731_B5bW4l0KW_1n1f7BW8bSgWT2cwh9kN2QZyB64hlJDW1KPvLh6Zq_ywW8h_9v281XzYLW7BxXhJ7tClK1W5qtwWM8mvt7-W1cFBqM7_Y9qLW2RvFfT26f-ZWMzxjP5jglZxW1n_tG43tW0c7VYsrDd8_d6MbW3msxLY7cV79MW8lSNP_8BSgRCW2C-wn07HmQ58W3YSm6c3j8Nf5W6p2Sjc1KVr60V735N08Vfw58W1ctZDX6zWNqjW2XwkXl6SzgwvW3XPVCc4K98jYW7Gt03Z3kKhltW62-chd2_YSspW84VcQh5YBz5cW8BJ-wJ1-mCbyW1StBl012kj0jW4RNrq35p_8DLW7BWfm47hn7mwW7FVX2G5Fw4BVW4TD2nW27nmtNW1LBf_18csNyXN7-PVxtR1DX-VXLl752L5DvVW1BftwM14WVVkW47wjGH84KFCnW2sYSVy6KLclYW3bN7cZ8qMYy0W7Hr_6_7wD2BjW5td5pn3zhbs0W7FSLJ06NYPtPW58Fyxw5SnMhxW7CTSx_4S4fsfW269x3D7ZFMmsN7WFjW7hYPtZW2jVtdq2mZKN5W2rGRRj8XwVS6VgsVpb2D8PRMW41k3vC5tPXr9W5YMfTw26-trtW2cF-0m6WG1FdW82t9pn8TSRxzW2nL1Mx687xzRW6Ygd7l7hyFtwW8MnSK97xHN8ZW8HhVQL7yS2-SW6zj7QS4HlsRBW5hG8BK3G72tLW5cl9ty3yF1ZLW4mdSvf7KYL8mW2gBhKW5gGSq8W2b9zwN7TDhPlV5DTVH5lBlhQW85bvJr5VcPZ3W8VRZxD13MjGrW2TzZ4F2jsr2WW56_6CL7BhvgPW8wXM7R3qdr1CW3ddFBH3rnqPvVS45bR6tSvVxW50rZwQ9gRzXxW4nBRhl5ZPCY8W1tqlhz3HRBRVVHh1-B3BJfc0W7_DkHQ8mN6MMW8Q8nmp6TrqmtN61Z9CQPgJ43W95cGtr4V6j10N4JyKLWbQnvKW4N8F1T25nbVTf2bWx0W04&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C0eccaf36e30b44cd403008dcecf11b71%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638645767538049208%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=fQdXjzF08TtuBi5hSS0%2FO4YCGqY8CNerflj7Hg25EWA%3D&reserved=0>
